version_description:
Updated with compatibility for Minecraft 0.14.
Added all new items in MCPE 0.14.
Fixed adventure mode (prevent placing blocks)
Fixed reported connection issues.
Improved core update procedure.
Fixed low sound bug.
Improved voice chat.
Fixed invites not showing popup.
Added Minecart TNT to default prevent list.

v.2.31
Fixed enchantment bug.
Fixed critical core bug.

v2.30
Updated with compatibility for Minecraft 0.14.
Added all new items in MCPE 0.14.
Fixed adventure mode (prevent placing blocks)
Fixed reported connection issues.
Improved core update procedure.
Fixed low sound bug.
Improved voice chat.
Fixed invites not showing popup.
Added Minecart TNT to default prevent list.

v3.00
Improved Google login.
Upgraded back end server - connecting to servers is now instant.
Changed connection method to improve connection reliability.
NOTE: You now need an internet connection to use commands even locally or with Bluetooth. Bluetooth connections can still be made without commands and internet.
Removed Voice chat (while we change some things on our end!)
There are a lot of back end changes in this version, please let us know about any bugs!

- Fixed VPN issues/bugs (including Plug randomly leaving your game).
- Fixed Permission groups not saving.
- Fixed Bluetooth. Remember if no WiFi is available and the device running the server has an internet connection (eg Mobile Data), you can join that server and use commands over Bluetooth. However if the server does not have an internet connection you can only use simple Bluetooth connections (no commands).

- Fixed an issue where users with a certain IP range could not join or host servers
If you have any disconnection issues, or anything impacting your experience please send us an email by going to the 'Help' tab and using the support icon on the top right.

- Fixed VPN rekeying issue (Plug randomly leaving the game).
- Added colours to plug messages
- Old method of preventing block breaking is working again :)

NOTE: The camera item has been disabled by Mojang in Minecraft PE 14.2 You can still get a camera by doing .g 498 but it is not placeable and has no function. This is NOT a Plug PE bug!

- Fixed Bluetooth.
- Fixed Plug leaving randomly.
- Fixed effects command.
- Fixed grief protection (prevent items).
- Updated Camera item.
- Voice chat is back!
- Added VPN FAQ.

v3.06
- Fixed VPN rekey typo which caused Plug PE to leave randomly.

v3.05
- Fixed Bluetooth.
- Fixed Plug leaving randomly.
- Fixed effects command.
- Fixed grief protection (prevent items).
- Updated Camera item.
- Voice chat is back!
- Added VPN FAQ.

** Updated for Minecraft 0.15.0 **

- Fixed disconnection issues
- Fixed stability issues
- Fixed lots and lots of reported bugs!

- Added new items:
Sticky Piston, Piston, Piston Head, Block moved by Piston, Observer, Tipped (Enchanted) arrows, Fire Charge, Leather Horse Armor, Iron Horse Armor, Golden Horse Armor, Diamond Horse Armor, Lead, Name Tag, Raw Mutton, Cooked Mutton

- New Spawn eggs:
Horse, Donkey, Mule, Skeleton Horse, Zombie Horse, Stray, Husk, Wither Skeleton

v3.11
- Updated for Minecraft 0.15.2
- Fixed all reported bugs. Thank you for reporting!

v3.10
- Updated for Minecraft 0.15.0
- Fixed disconnection issues
- Fixed stability issues
- Fixed lots and lots of reported bugs!

- Added new items:
Sticky Piston, Piston, Piston Head, Block moved by Piston, Observer, Tipped (Enchanted) arrows, Fire Charge, Leather Horse Armor, Iron Horse Armor, Golden Horse Armor, Diamond Horse Armor, Lead, Name Tag, Raw Mutton, Cooked Mutton

- New Spawn eggs:
Horse, Donkey, Mule, Skeleton Horse, Zombie Horse, Stray, Husk, Wither Skeleton

- Fixed reported connection problems.
- Fixed Plug PE timeout issues.
- Fixed timeout on players joining.
- Fixed Plug not responding to commands.
- Fixed Plug not joining some worlds.

- Fixed Plug getting stuck at 'please wait...' when loading.
- Fixed Plug thinking player is in the nether when in overworld.
- Improved voice chat quality.
- Fixed players freezing on connect.
- Optimised for latest Minecraft PE
